H0.text: Sound wave is not a type of electromagnetic wave.

H1.text: X-ray is not a type of electromagnetic wave.

H2.text: Microwave is not a type of electromagnetic wave.

H3.text: Radio wave is not a type of electromagnetic wave.

A4.text: Sound cannot travel through a vacuum.

A5.text: Sound is propagated by progressive longitudinal vibratory disturbances (sound waves).
